fol.75r
A l
re
to Thomas Bodley esq
r
Councello
r
for
her Ma
te
w
th
the
Estates
generall
of the
United Provinces
in the
Lowe Contryes
. Whereas direction
was given unto
S
r
Nicholas Parker
Knight to go into
Bryttaine
w
th
his
Companie of horse wherein he hathe made some excuse and delaie by reason
the
Count Moryce
did staie him for some cause of Service. wee have
by her Ma
t
expresse
order
Commaunded
ment
him againe to p
nt
him selfe in a
readynes all delaies and Excuses sett a
te for that purpose. And
to
fol.75v
to thend there be no default made, wee have thought good also
to Require yo
w
to geve him the lyke straight charege and to see yt
formed. And
t anie of his Companie be wantinge, that the
same maie be
swaded
supplied out of the companie of
S
r
John
Poly
. Wherein yf occac
o
n serve yo
w
maie let the States or the
Count Moryce to und
r
stand her Ma
t
meanynge not to alter her former
determynac
o
n. And yf there be anie of his companie that are maryed
in those
tes beinge contrary to suche order as hathe ben by us taken
for Retayninge [nowe] in those Bandes that have taken wyves there, yo
w
shall give direction to
S
r
Thomas Sherleyes
deputie to mak staie
of soch Intertainem
t
as maie be due unto them, and here after to
make them no further allowaunce./
